Shivah/Blacknightmare


"Well, well" said a male's voice "Why do you enjoy threat to others 
femmes Blacknightmare?"

"So you was listening... Shivah"replied the femme

"I was just checking that all things are ok... My new duties" replied 
Shivah"You're becoming so soft, so Sweet... that will make you 
troubles Lady reaven" Thought Shivah. Blacknightmare didn't say any 
thing, she had her reasons. Shivah added "You have a mission, 
Blacknightmare, so you have to go... you will leave the base in 20 
minutes I'll give you the coordinates... "

Blacknightmare left the room annoyed, Shivah smiled sarcastically and 
looking to Blaze and Silverscout, Shivah said while he did a nice 
smiled "So, You're Blaze and and you, Silverscout..."
